name: Trivial Bitsy #2: New modes and quests :D
name_original: Trivial Bitsy #2: New modes and quests :D
description:
Trivial Bitsy #2: New modes and quests :D is an educational game developed by Eloy Ruiz. It came out on 25-10-2021.
Trivial Bitsy #2: New modes and quests :D is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
